EvmAdvance(uint256,address,address,uint2.details: See EIP-4399 for safe usage of `prevRandao`.

params.blockNumber: The number of the block in which the input was added
params.blockTimestamp: The timestamp of the block in which the input was added
params.index: The index of the input in the input box
params.msgSender: The address of whoever sent the input
params.payload: The payload provided by the message sender
params.prevRandao: The latest RANDAO mix of the post beacon state of the previous block

EvmAdvance(uint256,address,address,uint2.notice: An advance request from an EVM-compatible blockchain to a Cartesi Machine.
